short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Link in New Tab, as a last tab on another window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you open a link on a new tab, it goes behind the current tab.
For me, this default behaviour is quite annoying when opening multiple links from a web page for reading later.

So I made this extension:

Just right-click on a certain link, and select 'Open This On That' in the context menu.
It will simply open the link on a new tab, placed on the tail, in another window if possible.
Newly opened tab will not be focused automatically, so you can browse on without switching the tab.
